name: Economic-Outlook-Generator
content:
Economic Outlook Generator Application


Project Overview


Objective:

The Economic Outlook Generator is an application designed to streamline the generation of economic outlook reports. Users can upload market research documents, generate summaries, and view the final reports. The system is divided into two main stages:

  1. Document Uploader Stage
  2. Outlook Generation Stage


Stage 1: Document Uploader

In this stage, users can upload documents to the repository for a specific quarter and year. These documents will serve as reference material for generating economic outlooks.

Steps:

  1. Access Document Uploader: Navigate to the Document-Uploader tab.
  2. Set Generation Period:
  • Select the Year (e.g., 2024).
  • Choose the Quarter (e.g., Q1).
  1. Assign Repository Name: The repository name will be generated automatically based on the selected year and quarter (e.g., Ref-Document-Repo-2024-Q1).
  2. Upload Documents:
  • Drag and drop files into the Document Upload area or click Browse to select files.
  • Once uploaded, the file names and sizes will appear in the list.
  1. Proceed to the Next Stage: Click Next to continue to the Outlook Generation stage.


Stage 2: Outlook Generation

In this stage, users can refresh the document list, configure generation options, and generate the economic outlook report.

Steps:

  1. Access Outlook Generation: Navigate to the Outlook-Generation tab.
  2. Refresh Document List:
  • Click on the Refresh the List button under the Reference Documents section to ensure all uploaded files are displayed.
  1. Select Language: Choose the preferred language for the report (e.g., English or Italian).
  2. Select Summary Constructs: Select the sections to include in the report:
  • Macroeconomic Scenario
  • Fiscal and Monetary Policy
  • Government Bonds and Bond Market
  • Credit
  • Stock Market
  • Emerging Markets
  • Foreign Exchange Market
  • Sustainable Investments
  1. Generate Economic Outlook: Click Generate to create the economic outlook report.
  2. View or Enhance Report:
  • To view the generated report, select View Latest or View from History.
  • Enable Enhance Report if further refinements are required.


Features:

  • Multi-Language Support: Generate reports in multiple languages.
  • Customizable Summaries: Include or exclude specific sections of the report.
  • Document Management: Upload and refresh document lists dynamically.
